questions.question: Which of the following is a correct way to declare a JavaScript variable?
What is the output of `typeof null` in JavaScript?
Which function is used to parse a string into an integer in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the `map()` method in JavaScript?
choices: Iterates through an array and modifies the original array
Creates a new array by applying a function to each element of the array
Filters elements of an array based on a condition
Finds the index of a specific element in an array
questions.correctAnswer: Creates a new array by applying a function to each element of the array

questions.question: Which of the following is a JavaScript data type?
How can you create a function in JavaScript?
What will be the output of `console.log(2 + '2')`?
What does the `push()` method do in JavaScript?
choices: Adds an element to the end of an array
Removes the last element from an array
Adds an element to the beginning of an array
Removes the first element from an array
questions.correctAnswer: Adds an element to the end of an array

questions.question: Which keyword is used to define a constant in JavaScript?
